title: Zed autos and shadows don't make noise anymore?
body: So I haven't played Zed for about a week or so and when i was in game with him, i found that his auto attacks and most of his shadows, his jokes, and the pop on his death mark (so basically his everything) don't make noise right now. I thought maybe it was just a bug with the shockblade zed skin, but when i went into a game with the classic skin on, he doesn't make any noise at all, no matter what he does. Is anyone else having this problem, where Zed isn't making noise no matter what he does, or what's going on??

replies.body: Kateykhaos there has been a “game breaking” bug with {{champion:238}} w+q combo, where his q doesn’t go out of his w which can lose you the lane and make bad trades, it’s just very toxic and many zed mains like myself has to struggle with this bug, please fix it, much love.

You need to rethink your use of the word "toxic" there, "toxic" is usually used to describe players being salty, malicious trolls. I think the word you're looking for is that not duplicating your Q is very "irritating"

No even champions can be toxic because of the how they’re remember old nidalee? yeah she could just stand back and throw spears which dealt more than 2k with full ap yeah that’s toxic but yeah irritating can also describe it :)

Hey itsjustintym, 

Have you checked your audio settings in game, to ensure SFX and VO aren't set to zero? (It's probably super obvious, but it's worth a shot!) Are you experiencing this every game, or is it happening sporadically?
i played zed earlier and had no problems at all.
